text: calling all chocolate lovers today on

chocolate mousse and since I'm a huge

right in starting with our custard so
here I have 3/4 cup of heavy cream 4 egg
yolks and 2 tablespoons of granulated
sugar just whisking this together to

medium low I'm just gonna heat this for
a few minutes stirring until it's thick
enough to coat the back of a spoon all
right this is thick enough I'm gonna put
it straight through a sieve on to 8
ounces of bittersweet chocolate it's
okay if it's a little bit thicker at the
bottom because the sieve is there to
catch all of those little lumps just
like that can just push it through now
I'll just let this sit for a couple
minutes let the chocolate have time to

this is ready to stir in and I use 60%
cocoa for this in the chocolate you do
want to use good quality chocolate for
this because when you have so few
ingredients you really want to let them
shine so if you go to the store look for
60 to 70% chocolate it'll still have a
nice rich flavor without being too
bitter what I'm looking for here is a
thick fudgy texture because we're going
to be lightening it with whipped cream
after it cools so this looks great I'm
going to put this in the fridge until

and a quarter cups of chilled heavy

is shows

now that this has lightened a little bit
